title: Cointxz
author: Cointxz
content: Crazy Time is a unique live online game show built on our extremely successful Dream Catcher money wheel concept. Now the interactive fun and excitement reaches crazy new levels with the chance to add multipliers from the Top Slot in each game round and in four exciting bonus games. Interactive elements and advanced technology make it possible for players to win different multipliers in two out of the four bonus games. Offering live entertainment with added advanced RNG gameplay, Crazy Time offers a one-of-a-kind player experience, and with multipliers up to 25,000x the fun hits a new high![1]I know that many user here is playing this game so I decided to start this thread since no one is talking about this game anymore. I recently become hook up on this game after watching multiple streamers that playing this game to hunt win. This game is exciting due to its bonus games and additional multiplier round. So far this is still the best game show made by evolution gaming despite there’s a lot of new game coming.Crazy time also now have 2 live games which named Crazy Time A. This additional new game only means the demand of this game is so massive.Personal Betting Strategy: Bet on both 5 & 2 consecutively and wait for the multiplier hits to have a huge win. I hate hunting bonus game now since it’s rarely give huge multiplier especially coin flip that always sucks these days. You can use 1 & 10 bet combo too if you want a hard core betting experience.If I saw that there’s no bonus hit on last 25 games and above, this is the only time when I hunt bonus games because it usually pay massive after a very long non bonus game streak.Personal High Win: x2000 with 1$ bet on Crazy Time. We got x10 multiplier Crazy Time then hits double one time and x2000 to finish the game. This is massive if I place 5$ bet on it instead of the coin flip.Favorite Host: Pavel for the win!I want to discuss with you guys betting strategy, max win you got and your experience playing this game. Feel free to comment below.You can play this game on Livecasino.io if you want a better benefits for playing live games!  [1] https://www.evolution.com/our-games/crazy-time/

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: I don't feel like that game is provably fair. I'm not saying users will never win, but is really hard to see some big wins. I don't feel the RTP is 97.3 as they claim. For me it feels like they can stop the wheel when they want and select the result from the back end, maybe I'm just too paranoid but that's the sensation I have after playing a lot of hours on that game.Is about joining at the right time and placing the right bet, another way you could be there for hours losing all your balance.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on March 17, 2023, 07:24:52 PMI don't feel like that game is provably fair. I'm not saying users will never win, but is really hard to see some big wins. I don't feel the RTP is 97.3 as they claim. For me it feels like they can stop the wheel when they want and select the result from the back end, maybe I'm just too paranoid but that's the sensation I have after playing a lot of hours on that game.Is about joining at the right time and placing the right bet, another way you could be there for hours losing all your balance.I can relate to you at some point of my game especially when I’m losing hard. I’m just relying on the credibility of the provider for me to still continue playing on this game. Actually I’m still not 100% convinced that every game is not a rigged because there’s a possibility that they are using magnets on wheel same with other bonus games like coin flip, pachinko and crazy time.But despite this uncertainty, I’m still playing because I can see some streamers that winning huge amount that makes me motivated to play more. I hit my highest win on this game recently after being motivated by watching the video of xposed playing crazy time and win the max win of 500,000$ on his bet. I experience the huge win by myself so I’m now optimistic that the game is probably fair for me. Here’s the video of Xposed winning 500,000$ max win on Crazy Time: https://youtu.be/D4ZaPDdVV2ISometimes I’m spending a lot of time by just watching youtube videos of this game. It’s satisfying seeing someone huge win on the bonus rounds.

comments.author: Fortify

Now the interactive fun and excitement reaches crazy new levels with the chance to add multipliers from the Top Slot in each game round and in four exciting bonus games. Interactive elements and advanced technology make it possible for players to win different multipliers in two out of the four bonus games. Offering live entertainment with added advanced RNG gameplay, Crazy Time offers a one-of-a-kind player experience, and with multipliers up to 25,000x the fun hits a new high![1]I know that many user here is playing this game so I decided to start this thread since no one is talking about this game anymore. I recently become hook up on this game after watching multiple streamers that playing this game to hunt win. This game is exciting due to its bonus games and additional multiplier round. So far this is still the best game show made by evolution gaming despite there’s a lot of new game coming.Crazy time also now have 2 live games which named Crazy Time A. This additional new game only means the demand of this game is so massive.Personal Betting Strategy: Bet on both 5 & 2 consecutively and wait for the multiplier hits to have a huge win. I hate hunting bonus game now since it’s rarely give huge multiplier especially coin flip that always sucks these days. You can use 1 & 10 bet combo too if you want a hard core betting experience.If I saw that there’s no bonus hit on last 25 games and above, this is the only time when I hunt bonus games because it usually pay massive after a very long non bonus game streak.Personal High Win: x2000 with 1$ bet on Crazy Time. We got x10 multiplier Crazy Time then hits double one time and x2000 to finish the game. This is massive if I place 5$ bet on it instead of the coin flip.Favorite Host: Pavel for the win!I want to discuss with you guys betting strategy, max win you got and your experience playing this game. Feel free to comment below.It's a bit dumb suggesting a "personal betting strategy" because there is no strategy going on here. Every single time you play the casino has the advantage and if you play for long enough you will lose every single penny in your account. You're basically just running a subversive advertising campaign for a single casino here. This game is syndicated across many different sites, even fiat currency casinos, and does not really offer much in terms of originality. You're really stretching the limits of what counts as content here and this write up must have taken you a little while to get enough content on such a bland topic.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Every time I visit a gambling site I usually occasionally enter the game and bet several times, but it's really really bad, I never win at all.If I may compare, I prefer to play in slots than Crazy Time which is too difficult to get big multipliers there.But if in slot games it's so easy to get the big multiplier we can get.In this Crazy Time game, in my opinion, it drains your balance faster than slot games.However, if there is someone here who managed to get a big multiplier, please share their story. I want to see if it's true that someone in this forum got a big win at this Crazy Time.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Crazy Time is the most exhilarating and hype game for evolution gaming. It’s also the most bull shit game to be honest due to the fact that their bonus round can end up giving a x2 profit only even if it’s consider as bonus round.I rarely bet on this game because you will be addicted on chasing bonus games that is very rare to come without any guarantee that it will pay a very wholesome amount. Probably those user that manage to win big amount was already spend huge sum of money before they hit it. It’s very hard to timing bets on tiles with best multiplier. Sometimes the wheel spin sucks when the host can’t spin strong enough to have twice rotation that makes crazy time very hard to win.

This is the topic I created so I’m free to post what I want.Tbh, I don’t understand this criticism, it’s not even related to the topic of discussion here. Just ignore the thread if you are not a Crazy time player and don’t push to post on topic that you are not personally using. Quote from: klidex on March 18, 2023, 03:11:18 PMEvery time I visit a gambling site I usually occasionally enter the game and bet several times, but it's really really bad, I never win at all.If I may compare, I prefer to play in slots than Crazy Time which is too difficult to get big multipliers there.But if in slot games it's so easy to get the big multiplier we can get.In this Crazy Time game, in my opinion, it drains your balance faster than slot games.However, if there is someone here who managed to get a big multiplier, please share their story. I want to see if it's true that someone in this forum got a big win at this Crazy Time.It’s very hard to measure the difficulty of getting high multiplier on slots vs this game since both games is purely random result. Probably it looks like easier for you to get multiplier on slot because you are not choosing what to bet. But in my experience, I get high multiplier on crazy time than slot since I cover most of the betting option that increase my chance of winning while slot has a fixed winning chance percentage because it’s based on RNG.You can start by betting the minimum bet of 0.2$ and try hitting bonus game with extra multipliers. This pay huge if you get lucky.Quote from: Eternad on March 18, 2023, 04:09:53 PMCrazy Time is the most exhilarating and hype game for evolution gaming. It’s also the most bull shit game to be honest due to the fact that their bonus round can end up giving a x2 profit only even if it’s consider as bonus round.This is the only thing I hate on this game. You might end up winning low multiplier on bonus game but hey they offer up to x50 extra multiplier. You can have a one time big time if you manage to onboard with this extras.Quote from: Eternad on March 18, 2023, 04:09:53 PMI rarely bet on this game because you will be addicted on chasing bonus games that is very rare to come without any guarantee that it will pay a very wholesome amount. Probably those user that manage to win big amount was already spend huge sum of money before they hit it. It’s very hard to timing bets on tiles with best multiplier. Sometimes the wheel spin sucks when the host can’t spin strong enough to have twice rotation that makes crazy time very hard to win.Most of the gambling game is design to hook the players to play more by chasing lose or having some more fun like hunting the bonus. As the host of this game always said. This is game show and gambling at the same time. You can’t guarantee any huge return on every bets. It’s important to focus on having fun rather than chasing those huge win because you can guarantee fun by playing the game if you will just focu on entertainment.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: the strategy you have in Crazy Time is like I did in the roulette game. When placing a bet, I only place two places, 1ST Dozen and 3Rd Dozen, depending on where the ball stops more often when you look at the statistics.you say your strategy is to choose numbers 5 and 2 if you stop at one of these numbers you  get an equivalent win.To be honest, I've never bet on Crazy Time, but after seeing this thread I tried to see the gametrying and it's very easy for me to understand and I think I'm interested in  it.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Sharing today some massive x500 wins on Crazy Time by streamer @Ttdante. He is one of my favorite casters that I'm watching since he usually plays Crazy Time as his main game, unlike other streamers that are more on bonus hunt on a slot. He is probably one of the genuine streamers using his bankroll and not a casino partner because his bet is decent. Many gambling streamers throw 100k or more bets as if it's nothing because their balance is from a casino partnership like Drake.Anyway, he hit 10 with x50 which gives him a total of x500 multiplier on his bet. He bags a whooping 53K in that bet. BTW he is playing during his birthday and you will notice that the host is greeting him with a happy birthday song since many players are also watching his live stream. Does anyone here have experience playing at the same time with live streamers?Watch his replay here: https://youtu.be/qIxmsMzbhJkQuote from: len01 on March 19, 2023, 10:22:50 PMthe strategy you have in Crazy Time is like I did in the roulette game. When placing a bet, I only place two places, 1ST Dozen and 3Rd Dozen, depending on where the ball stops more often when you look at the statistics.you say your strategy is to choose numbers 5 and 2 if you stop at one of these numbers you  get an equivalent win.To be honest, I've never bet on Crazy Time, but after seeing this thread I tried to see the gametrying and it's very easy for me to understand and I think I'm interested in  it.Something like that bro. The goal is to hit multiple wins in a row but the only difference was Crazy Time has an additional multiplier feature that multiplies your winning.

comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on March 21, 2023, 06:44:34 AM-snip- I don't think sharing a winning from "Streamer" is a good thing.Even if it's your favorite streamer because we all know most of them are getting paid or using play money. That's why not really like it from any played from the streamer--Responding to the main thread, most of strategy betting bet:- Betting on all except 1.- Betting only the bonus.- Betting only the bonus + 10x multiplier.That's most common, and for strategy win there is no winning strategy because all-people know "Crazy Time" is rigged. The only way to win, it's at the team they started the win section for user.

Watching someone achieve a rare win is still entertaining and hype to watch. Sharing on what I believe is entertaining is never be a bad thing unless I encourage everyone to chase win to experience same win. We are all big boys here I think by going in the gambling discussion of the forum.   Quote from: ryzaadit on March 21, 2023, 08:19:24 PMResponding to the main thread, most of strategy betting bet:- Betting on all except 1.- Betting only the bonus.- Betting only the bonus + 10x multiplier.Aside on this list. Many use a combo bets that pair x1 or x2 on x5 and x10 to make a minimal bet as much as possible and with high chance of break even since x1 and x2 is very common to appear in multiple straight rounds.Quote from: ryzaadit on March 21, 2023, 08:19:24 PM for strategy win there is no winning strategy because all-people know "Crazy Time" is rigged. Yeah it’s really easy to accused that this game is rigged because of their game mechanism that is not completely transparent on choosing the winning bets. But it’s all about trust and entertainment to really enjoy this game.

comments.author: SirLancelot
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on March 21, 2023, 06:44:34 AMSharing today some massive x500 wins on Crazy Time by streamer @Ttdante. He is one of my favorite casters that I'm watching since he usually plays Crazy Time as his main game, unlike other streamers that are more on bonus hunt on a slot. He is probably one of the genuine streamers using his bankroll and not a casino partner because his bet is decent. Many gambling streamers throw 100k or more bets as if it's nothing because their balance is from a casino partnership like Drake.Anyway, he hit 10 with x50 which gives him a total of x500 multiplier on his bet. He bags a whooping 53K in that bet. BTW he is playing during his birthday and you will notice that the host is greeting him with a happy birthday song since many players are also watching his live stream. Does anyone here have experience playing at the same time with live streamers?It's truly more entertaining to watch a streamer gambling using their own funds. This is where we can relate more and not on those streamers who are funded by a gambling company as it looks like they are playing in a demo mode. It's not fun to watch anymore but maybe some people find them entertaining if those streamers team it up with a crazy reaction just like what we see on the ads.This guy is blessed because he win a good amount on his birthday but another good and unforgettable experience that he got is when the host greeted him live. I bet he did not expect that? But I wonder if regular players are also treated like that? That would be awesome.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: I always bet for the bonus round and 10, so I put 5 bets every spin.  We all know that Crazy Time result is all random so I think strategy depends on how the player wanted to spend his bankroll.  Sometimes, we can see consecutive bonus rounds so with the bet on all bonus round can easily recover or replenish out bankroll if we are on the red streak.But honestly, with the randomness of the result, I think there is no foolproof strategy here, and we are just wishing that the result of the spin will hit our bet.Quote from: ryzaadit on March 22, 2023, 05:49:38 PMQuote from: Coin_trader on March 22, 2023, 04:43:07 PMNot all people but those people that addicted on chasing huge win. Yeah it’s really easy to accused that this game is rigged because of their game mechanism that is not completely transparent on choosing the winning bets. But it’s all about trust and entertainment to really enjoy this game.It's actually rigged bro, you can search in 'Youtube' while the wheel keep spinning over and over again without stop even there has some needle. That's why, the only things are winning for us to play on lucky section (while they give the winning to user). I think the game is closely monitored, if it is rigged then we could have heard an action from the gambling regulatory board.  It is also possible that the result is predetermined and is controlled by RNG making it looks like a rigged game.Whether it is rigged or not, I am still neutral since I cannot verify or find proof that it is rigging its result.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: I was watching a video about this game... and something is wrong with the game, so, I would like to discuss the topic with the community.First point:The wheel gets stuck, and it moves as if some one pushing it:Source: https://youtu.be/otse42ToeJY?t=520And second point:The user places a $275 bet on 2, under the number we see the legend "Pasys 2x" and after a win, he gets $825. but why??? We know $275*2 is $550, so, this is nonsense.Source: https://youtu.be/otse42ToeJY?t=560All this happens on the same stream. So, it was weird as hell.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I'm not a big fan of casino games, I've talked about it several times, but I'm really shocked when I see how with so little money someone can win a lot of money in these casino games, man these casino games even surpass lottery prizes sometimes when we compare the price of lottery tickets and the maximum lottery prize vs the amount you can bet on these casino games versus what you can win, with these multipliers up to 25,000x when the person puts $50 and If you are lucky enough to win, then that person has already secured the retirement as soon as the casino pays himthis means that with these multipliers up to 25,000x the casino will restrict the maximum amount a person can bet on right? well in the OP it says that someone put 1$ in a 2000X multiplier and won, man I know that a victory is something to celebrate a lot, but the guy put 1$, if he had put at least 2$ to 5$ he would have won a good amount of money, and that's why I think that in casino games the person needs at least to have 150$ at least per month to be able to play and if he wins to have a good amount of money, I know that 2000$ is a good amount, but not a very big amount, casino games depend on luck, they are the types of games where when the person wins a lot of money he has to stop playing for a long time

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on March 23, 2023, 07:45:49 PMNot really into casino games, so it's justifiable if I say that this is my first time coming across this game, I don't watch gambling streamers as well, so it's hard to know which game is trending.Have been way deep into sports betting, I play casino games only once in a rare while,But having seen this thread here, I am going to play this game in particular when next I feel like having fun with casino games, I would love to know what the win ratio/probability is for this game from players who are already experienced. Sports betting is a bet that we can use to make profits a little easier than a game.So far, sports betting is very popular. Besides that, gamblers can bet, they can also watch the matches of the teams they like.But on the other hand, the games that are played live are no less fun, we as gamblers can also preview the course of the game to make an analysis before betting.In my opinion, crazy team is quite an interesting game to bet on, games like crazy team can give you profit opportunities if the analysis you make is right in this game, you can also place bets based on existing percentage statistics, making it easier you to consider which numbers are right to bet on.
